data: Below is a list of all the available Attributes within Minecraft:Bedrock Edition for use with Entity JSON files.

data.Description: `minecraft:attack` allows an entity to define an entity's melee attack and any additional effects on it's attack.
`minecraft:spell_effects` allows an entity to define effects to add and remove to the entity when adding this attribute.
`minecraft:strength` defines the entity's ability to carry items.
